1-5 (Architecture): The available information on architecture states that "gemma.cpp provides a minimalist implementation of Gemma-2, Gemma-3, and PaliGemma-2 models, focusing on simplicity and directness rather than full generality." This single sentence conveys that the repository implements those specific model variants and does so with a design goal of minimalism and straightforwardness rather than exhaustive architectural completeness.
